title: Installation issue: HDF5 macOS HDF5_IS_PARALLEL
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install hdf5
```

Then building an MPI-parallel downstream program and checking `HDF5_PREFER_PARALLEL`

cc @lrknox @skosukhin @chuckatkins 

### Information on your system

Since I don't own a mac, I am running nightly tests to install Spack packages on macOS systems on Azure Pipelines.

Since the transition to CMake in the HDF5 package #18937, **only on macOS**, the following line:
```cmake
set(HDF5_PREFER_PARALLEL ON)
find_package(HDF5 1.8.13 COMPONENTS C)
```
still finds the Spack provided HDF5 package but does not set `HDF5_IS_PARALLEL` to true.

The same logic works well on Linux.

### Additional information
